name: Block Playground
description:
Have you ever played with building blocks when you were a kid? Now you can reexperience that digitally in this game! With its advanced physics engine and ability to spawn 2 block shapes (Square & Circle), it can realistically simulate playing with building blocks! With features such as...

  • The ability to spawn as many blocks as you want! (Until the game crashes.)
  • Realistic Physics!
  • Music Selection!

If you found any bugs or have any suggestions, include that in your review!

CONTROLS

S: Spawn a square at your mouse's location

C: Spawn a circle at your mouse's location.

B: Hide/Show the Background.

Right Mouse: Move the Camera around.

Scroll Wheel Up: Normal Zoom.

Scroll Wheel Down: Farther Zoom.

Left Triple Click (At a block): Remove that specific block.

Space: Hide the Text at the start of the game.

1: Switch to wilidacious's song.

2: Switch to BusanBlack's song.

Graphical User Interface

X Button: Delete ALL shapes.

Music Button: Mute or Unmute the background music.

Expand Button: Make the game Fullscreen or non-fullscreen

Credits

Programming & Author: Prisimisho

Beta Tester: BurningMagma

Public Domain UI Buttons: Kenney

Music: exposure By wilidacious & Classic F o o l by @BusanBlack

Font: Roboto By Christian Robertson

Known Issues

  • You must interact with the game, then the music will kick in. This is not my fault, this is a browser limitation.
  • If you throw a shape into another shape too fast, it will clip through.
  • If pressing 1 and then 2 plays both songs at the same time, reload the page. Im trying to work on a solution for this.
  • For some reason, muting the game plays song 1. This is just bad programming by me, i will fix it on the next version. Switch to another song to fix it.
